document_data.name: Eltragar
document_data.mainbody: '''Eltragar''' was a mercenary in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He was thought of as a warrior.
document_data.Relationships: Together with [[Baergrim]] and [[Mheriyam]], Baergrim was part of the Blades.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1372}}, Eltragar, Mhaeriyam, and Baergrim were escorting [[Mhulker]] in [[Undermountain]]. Mhulker was seeking a particular woman to eat her brain; he found her chained and gagged in an altar, but it turned out to be a trap, which Baergrim spotted by noticing that the woman's gag covered her nose too. After [[Halaster Blackcloak]]'s trap slew Mhulker and the ancient wizard revealed himself, the mercenaries fled.
